meanings.sent1: The rerepeated sound of the clock ticking helped me fall asleep.
meanings.sent2: The rerepeated visits from the friendly mail carrier always brightened my day.
meanings.sent3: The rerepeated jokes from my dad never fail to make me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The rerepeated melody of the song echoed through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: The rerepeated rain showers brought much-needed relief to the dry land.

meanings.definition: To say or do something again
meanings.sent1: I rerepeated the instructions to make sure everyone understood.
meanings.sent2: She rerepeated her request for a refund after receiving a faulty product.
meanings.sent3: The parrot rerepeated the words it had just heard, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: His actions rerepeated the mistakes of the past, leading to similar consequences.
meanings.sent5: The teacher rerepeated the lesson to reinforce the important concepts.

meanings.definition: To say or do something again in the same way
meanings.sent1: He rerepeated the same apology, but it lacked sincerity.
meanings.sent2: The actor rerepeated his lines flawlessly during the final performance.
meanings.sent3: The magician rerepeated the trick, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her words rerepeated in his mind, causing a sense of deja vu.
meanings.sent5: The artist rerepeated the brush strokes to achieve the desired effect.
